reviews.review_msg: Make sure to use the email given on syllabus if you are trying to reach him and not the canvas email.

Dr. Jovanovic is incredibly knowledgeable. His lectures were packed with information but his slides were dry, meaning that there was lots of note taking. His tests and assignments were straightforward and the answers were often said during lecture. Overall, Dr. Jovanovic is a great professor who is clear but you must be attentive in his lectures.

The class is manageable, but this semester he did not respond to emails sometimes, and when he did, it was already too late. Also, he took forever grading the PSA assignments and the Quizzes. I took him once before, and he was great, but now I would have preferred not to have taken his class.

Was sad I had to take this course as a credit initially, but he is very passionate about the material and inspired me to learn. I was super stressed about what textbooks and stuff we needed and he helped a lot. I messed up his name in that email and he wasn't too pleased. I'd recommend making sure you've typed his name in correctly before emailing

Professor Aleksandar is a nice prof that isn't too hard on grading. His lectures are manageable and he provides the readings for you. He has the course broken down into 3 quizzes, an exam, discussions and an assignment and it is pretty manageable.
I thought this was one of my best online classes. Aleks' lecture videos were very informative and fun. I was always happy to learn.
Aleks' class was very informative and the subject matter very interesting. I liked his lecture videos a lot and he was always available on Zoom or on email when I needed help.

I'm so glad that he did not make this class buy a textbook! He helped students save money that way! He is capable of presenting serious concepts in a smooth and controlled way during lecture. Get ready to do a ton of reading though :)
Best prof I've ever had. I loved him. He was so funny and interactive. Definitely take his class if you have the opportunity

Went into this class as an elective but left really enjoying it and going to miss having Jamie as a prof. He puts the students first and wants everyone to do well. You can tell he loves what he does and don't be afraid to participate and ask questions. Material does need to be studied to get a good mark but it's nothing crazy/unreasonable.
Jamie was probably my favourite prof. He is really fun and truly loves his job. He will chat about life and genuinely interacted with us students. His class was a great experience

This class is based mostly off quizzes and exams. But, the prof is super caring and wants to help his students. He is very considerate of his students and is willing to accommodate. I took this class as an elective and I loved it!! He is also very funny and you can always have a conversation with him about anything. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!!
